name: Roswell Invasion
description:
It's 1947 and all is quiet in the small town of Roswell New Mexico... Until it isn't. Follow the "true" story of the Roswell New Mexico incident and relive the suspense as aliens invade your small town. 

  • 2D Action shooting gameplay.
  • Lots of powerups and multiple ways to kill enemies. 
  • Custom scoring system that allows for a different high score every game!

For windows only. Not licensed to be used on any other platform.
